main event: Mr. Dixon observed strange circular objects emitting a reddish glow in the sky over Walnut Creek, California on March 6, 1956.
interesting points: The objects were estimated to be approximately 40 feet in diameter., Mr. Dixon reported the sighting to local police and the Air Force., The objects were observed for about 20 to 25 minutes., The objects appeared to follow a westerly course., A preliminary investigation by police and Air Force personnel yielded no additional witnesses.
sighted object: circular objects emitting a reddish glow
witness description: Mr. Dixon, residing at 1660 Oakwood Avenue, Walnut Creek, California.
